text: Richard Adjei (30 January 1983 – 26 October 2020) was a German bobsledder and footballer. He was also an linebacker. Adjei was born in Düsseldorf, North Rhine-Westphalia. He won a silver medal for bobsledding at the 2010 Winter Olympics. Adjei died on 26 October 2020 from a heart attack at the age of 37.Er spielte für Rhein Fire Olympia-Medaillengewinner Richard Adjei verstorben ==References== Category:1983 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Olympic silver medalists for Germany Category:Sportspeople from Düsseldorf Category:German bobsledders
title: Richard Adjei
